item.title: About
item.description: Catja first became involved in Lighting Design while studying English at Cambridge University, she was the Lighting Designer and Technician for over 20 shows. These included Lagoon: The Cambridge Footlights International Tour Show 2016, which toured the UK, US, and Grand Cayman; the Cambridge European Theatre Groupâ€™s production of Hamlet, which toured to Switzerland and Belgium; a two-week run of West Side Story at the ADC Theatre; and five productions at the Edinburgh Fringe Festival.
